x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.potential_impact: A digital safety verification platform for women’s transportation and community ride-sharing. This enable thousands of verified safe rides, empowering women to move freely with real-time safety tracking.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: Rising incidents of harassment and unsafe transport options make mobility risky for women in many Nigerian cities.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.project_name: SafeRideNow – Women’s Safe Transport Verification Hub
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

This solution will use the products listed and not limited to the following;

  • Service Portal for ride verification and user feedback.
  • Flow Designer for SOS triggers and authority alerts.
  • Virtual Agent for voice-based emergency reporting.

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

We'll need to implement IntegrationHub with SMS/WhatsApp APIs for instant alerts and also GPS tracking integration.

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

Some challenges might include the following;

  • Data validation of drivers.
  • Maintaining anonymity and safety of users, amongst others.
